blacklist.helpDescription: Please use this command like the usages below.
blacklist.invalidMember: That user does not exist or is not in this server.
blacklist.invalidBlacklist: You can only choose between Suggestion, Report or All.

config.helpDescription: Please use this command like the usages below.
config.invalidLanguage: That language is not supported. You can find a list with supported languages [here](%language_list_link%).
config.suggestionChannelUpdated: Successfully changed the suggestion channel to %new_channel%.
config.reportChannelUpdated: Successfully changed the report channel to %new_channel%.
config.logChannelUpdated: Successfully changed the log channel to %new_channel%.
config.approveEmojiUpdated: Successfully changed the approve emoji to %new_emoji%.
config.rejectEmojiUpdated: Successfully changed the reject emoji to %new_emoji%.
config.invalidNumberOption: You can only enter -1 (to disable) and higher (to enable).
config.autoApproveUpdated: Open suggestions will now be approved after `%new_amount%` human upvote reactions.
config.autoRejectUpdated: Open suggestions will now be rejected after `%new_amount%` human downvote reactions.
config.invalidToggleOption: You can only choose between `On` and `Off`.
config.deleteApprovedUpdated: Automatic deletion of approved suggetions is now turned `%new_value%`.
config.deleteRejectedUpdated: Automatic deletion of rejected suggetions is now turned `%new_value%`.

movereport.invalidReport: I can't move that report because it doesn't exist.
movereport.invalidChannel: I can't move the report because I couldn't find that channel.
movereport.invalidMessage: I can't move that report because I wasn't able to find the original message.

report.onBlacklist: You've been blacklisted by the Administrators of this server, therefore you cannot create reports.
report.invalidChannel: Please make sure that the owner of the server configured the report channel properly.
report.reportSent: You're report in %guild_name% was successfully created.

resolve.invalidReport: I can't resolve that report because it doesn't exist.
resolve.statusUpdated: Successfully updated the status of that report.

approve.invalidSuggestion: I can't approve that suggestion because it doesn't exist.
approve.statusUpdated: Successfully updated the status of that suggestion.

consider.invalidSuggestion: I can't consider that suggestion because it doesn't exist.
consider.statusUpdated: Successfully updated the status of that suggestion.

reopen.invalidSuggestion: I can't approve that suggestion because it doesn't exist.
reopen.statusUpdated: Successfully updated the status of that suggestion.

list.suggestionListDescription: There are `%amount%` open suggestions. I'm displaying the latest 8.
list.reportListDescription: There are `%amount%` open reports. I'm displaying the latest 8.

movesuggestion.invalidSuggestion: I can't move that suggestion because it doesn't exist.
movesuggestion.invalidChannel: I can't move the suggestion because I couldn't find that channel.
movesuggestion.invalidMessage: I can't move that suggestion because I wasn't able to find the original message.

reject.invalidSuggestion: I can't reject that suggestion because it doesn't exist
reject.statusUpdated: Successfully updated the status of that suggestion.

suggest.onBlacklist: You've been blacklisted by the Administrators of this server, therefore you cannot create suggestions.
suggest.invalidChannel: Please make sure that the owner of the server configured the suggestion channel properly.
suggest.suggestionSent: You're suggestion in %guild_name% was successfully created, you can find it [here](%message_url%).

donate.description:
Don't feel obligated to donate! It isn't a requirement but it helps us to maintenance our projects including Suggestions.

If you decided to donate contact `jerskisnow#8214` if you want to receive a premium rank, based on the amount you donated, on the official CodedSnow discord server! When you received a premium rank you'll receive some extra perks and you'll be thanked gratefully!

You can find more information including payment details [here](%donate_link%).

descriptions.suggest: Create a suggestion for this server.
descriptions.report: Create a report related to this server.
descriptions.list: Obtain the list of all the open suggestions.
descriptions.donate: Obtain information about donating to our bot.
descriptions.invite: Get the invite link of the bot.
descriptions.vote: Get the vote link of the bot.
descriptions.allowdm: Update your preferences regarding DM messages.

descriptions.approve: Approve a community made suggestion for your server.
descriptions.reject: Reject a community made suggestion for your server.
descriptions.consider: Consider a community made suggestion for your server.
descriptions.reopen: Reopen a community made suggestion for your server.
descriptions.resolve: Resolve a report for your server.
descriptions.list: Obtain a list of all open suggestions or reports.
descriptions.movesuggestion: Move a suggestion message to another channel.
descriptions.movereport: Move a report message to another channel.

descriptions.config: Modify the configuration for your server.
descriptions.blacklist: Prevent someone from creating suggestions and/or reports.

invite.description: If you're looking to invite suggestions into your own server, [click here](%bot_invite%). If you're looking for the support server or if you want to hang out with other users, [click here](%server_invite%).

vote.description: Voting for Suggestions make it appear higher in the discordbot list, you can vote [here](%vote_link%).

allowdm.invalidToggleOption: You can only choose between `On` and `Off`.
allowdm.allowDMUpdated: AllowDM preference updated. DMs are now turned `%new_value%`

blacklistLogs.clearedSuggestion: %admin_tag% cleared all users from the suggestion blacklist.
blacklistLogs.clearedReport: %admin_tag% cleared all users from the report blacklist.
blacklistLogs.clearedAll: %admin_tag% cleared all users from all blacklists.
blacklistLogs.isOnSuggestion: %user_tag% tried to create a suggestion but is blacklisted.
blacklistLogs.isOnReport: %user_tag% tried to create a report but is blacklisted.

logs.autoApproveUpdated: `%user_tag%` changed the auto approve amount to %new_amount%.
logs.autoRejectUpdated: `%user_tag%` changed the auto reject amount to %new_amount%.
logs.reportCreated: `%user_tag%` created a new report, you can find it [here](%message_url%).
logs.reportResolved: `%user_tag%` changed to status of report `%report_id%` to resolved.
logs.suggestionApproved: `%user_tag%` changed the status of suggestion `%suggestion_id%` to approved.
logs.suggestionUnderConsideration: `%user_tag%` changed the status of suggestion `%suggestion_id%` to under consideration.
logs.suggestionRejected: `%user_tag%` changed the status of suggestion `%suggestion_id%` to rejected.
logs.suggestionReopened: `%user_tag%` changed the status of suggestion `%suggestion_id%` to open.
logs.suggestionCreated: `%user_tag%` created a new suggestion, you can find it [here](%message_url%).
logs.autoApproved: The status of suggesiton `%suggestion_id%` was automatically updated to approved.
logs.autoRejected: The status of suggesiton `%suggestion_id%` was automatically updated to rejected.

additional.invalidStaffRole: Please make sure that the owner of the server configured the staff role properly.
additional.roleRequired: You need to have the `%role_name%` role in order to use that command.
additional.permRequired: You need to have the `%perm_name% in order to use that command.`
additional.underConstruction: This feature is under construction and may not be used, yet.
